backgroundInformationList.description: Notice of Heritage Designation for 628, 634 and 636 Church Street

contact.contactName: Toronto and East York Community Council

noticeDescription: Take notice that the Council of the City of Toronto has passed By-law No. 1024-2017 to designate 628 Church Street (Mahattan Apartments), And 634 And 636 Church Street (Bernard Haldan Houses) (Toronto Centre-Rosedale, Ward 27) as being of cultural heritage value or interest.

otherReferenceList.description: TE17.28 - Alterations to a Heritage Property, Intention to Designate Under Part IV, Section 29 of the Ontario Heritage Act, and Authority to Enter Into a Heritage Easement Agreement - 628, 634 and 636 Church Street
By-law 1025-2017 - To designate the property at 628 Church Street (Manhattan Apartments) and 634 and 636 Church Street (Bernard Haldan Houses), as being of cultural heritage value or interest

subheading: In the Matter of the Ontario Heritage Act R.S.O. 1990 Chapter 0.18 and 628 Church Street (Mahattan Apartments), and 634 and 636 Church Street (Bernard Haldan Houses) City of Toronto, Province of Ontario
title: Notice of Passing of By-law 1025-2017 - 628 Church Street (Mahattan Apartments), and 634 and 636 Church Street (Bernard Haldan Houses) - Heritage Designation
topics: Heritage > Designation of a heritage property
